tasks.label: React Dev in Docker
tasks.command: docker build -t e-commerce . && docker run --rm -it -p 3000:3000 -v ${PWD}:/app -v /app/node_modules e-commerce

tasks.label: React Prod in Docker
tasks.command: docker build -f Dockerfile.prod -t e-commerce-prod . && docker run --rm -it -p 8080:80 e-commerce-prod
